mapper.select: SELECT OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, ITEM_NUM_SEQ, ITEM_COMMENT_NO_SEQ, ITEM_COMMENT_CONTENT, ITEM_COMMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT M.OPT_ID, I.OPT_NO_SEQ, I.ITEM_NUM_SEQ, I.ITEM_COMMENT_NO_SEQ, I.ITEM_COMMENT_CONTENT, I.ITEM_COMMENT_DATE FROM OPT_ITEM_COMMENT I, OPT_MEMBER M WHERE I.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ) WHERE ITEM_NUM_SEQ = #{item_num_seq} ORDER BY ITEM_COMMENT_NO_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPT_ITEM_COMMENT VALUES( #{opt_no_seq}, #{item_num_seq}, ITEMCOMMENTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{item_comment_content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )
